divs: sighting detailswhen we first saw the sighting we were outside smoking a cigarette and i saw a blinking orb,sphere like shape flying at first i thought it was just a fast plane but than after about 10 minutes (8 minutes exactly) i looked up and it was still there just hovering,me and my friend were looking all over for a camera or phone for 10 minutes and we started recording.after about 5 minutes it was still there blinking about 5 different colors including the following red,blue,green,orange and purple we proceeded to record and after about another 5 minutes a huge star like shape appeared it was moving very slow and was not blinking it hovered and stopped then hovered and stopped continuously after that we started to freak out a little about 10 continuous ufo filled minutes we both(me and my friend) couldn't see the blinking orb anymore so we went back outside and went to the top floor of the building we saw the blinking orb again after about 5 more minutes recording we were looking for other suspicious things and out of no where my friend saw this teardrop shaped smoke\cloud thing that dropped very quickly then disappeared ,my friend was freaking out and she was crying and wanting to go inside i insisted we stay to get more proof\evidence and sure enough after about not even 3 minutes i see 1 myself a circle of smoke\cloud just moving to its right very quickly then vanished me being quite freaked out myself wanted to go inside to see if the recording had seen the smoke orbs, sadly it had not but we still about 15-20 minutes of proof for the blinking orb we came inside again and looked out our window to see if it was still there and sure enough the blinking orb moving much quicker was still there hovering slowly over a building the bright star like orb was about 30 feet away from where we originally saw it
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Westminster
There were no other sightings in Westminster on or around November 25th 2013
Object Shape: Circle, Disc, Egg, Sphere, Star-like, Teardrop
Summary: at first we thought is was a pplane but then it stayed in one spot and hovered for about 8 minutes blinking many different colors so we got our camera and recorded it
